For Eg: markwood@some_email.com ​ Body Parameters ​ slug string required Application slug. Eg: hubspot ​ config_id string A unique id for the config. If not provided, linked_account_id is considered as the config_id by default. ​ fields object Global input fields of the app described by slug Show Example properties ​ 649ade09c7b80fc6f0a3d1bc object This is an example field id of a map field.
